content: लोमश {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [लोमानि बाहुल्येन संत्यस्य श] {@--1@} Hairy, woolly, shaggy. {@--2@} Woollen. {@--3@} Containing hair. {@--4@} Consisting in sheep (as property). {@--5@} Overgrown with grass. --शः A sheep, ram. --शा {@--1@} A fox. {@--2@} A female jackal. {@--3@} An ape. {@--4@} Green vitriol.
